thread.section_title: Hotel Bradford Elysees - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Faultless hotel
thread.title_full: Faultless hotel - Review of Hotel Bradford Elysees - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: gilstaylor
title: Faultless hotel
text:
We have just spent a fantastic 3 nights in the Hotel Bradford Elysees. We were travelling with 3 children and we received such a warm welcome and excellent service from every member of staff. Everything about the hotel is brilliant - the buffet breakfast, the all day complimentary afternoon tea, the location (easy walking distance to main tourist areas and lots of amazing restaurants), the decor, the ambiance. We really didn't want to leave. I can't recommend this place enough.
Room Tip: Room 62 has a view of the Eiffel Tower. See more room tips
